trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the size of the image on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is automatically adjusted to fit on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> while retaining the original image proportions.
trans-unit.target: 지정 여부에 있는 이미지의 크기는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> 에 맞게 자동으로 조정 됩니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> 원래 이미지 비율을 유지 하는 동안 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>속성 이미지 처리의 다양 한 측면은 관련이.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이미지를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>컨트롤의 실행 시간 – 전용를 설정 하거나 이러한 속성을 직접 설정 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: 속성에서 둘 다와의 상호 작용에 의해 결정 됩니다 이미지 크기 조정 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>다음과 같이:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>이미지의 조합으로 결정 된 대로 최종 이미지의 소수 자릿수 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>설정 및 컨테이너의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>설정.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and ToolStripItemImageScaling is SizeToFit, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: -If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>은 `true` (기본값) ToolStripItemImageScaling SizeToFit, 이미지 크기가 경우가 발생 하는, 및와 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>크기는 가장 큰 항목 또는 지정 된 최소 크기의.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and ToolStripItemImageScaling is None, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: -If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>은 `false` ToolStripItemImageScaling None, 모두 이미지 이며 나 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>발생 크기 조정.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To control the image size, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이미지 크기를 제어 하려면 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the size of the image on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is not automatically adjusted to fit on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는에 있는 이미지의 크기는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> 에 맞게 자동으로 조정 되지 않는 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the size of the image on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is automatically adjusted to fit on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는에 있는 이미지의 크기는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> 에 맞게 자동으로 조정 됩니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>합니다.
